bug.short_desc: Rewrite tree data model to allow databinding

long_desc.thetext:
The current implementation of the SimpleTreeDataModel doesn't allow databinding, because it uses native arrays internally. I think we should rewrite the data model to use qx.data.Array and have started a backwards-compativle rewrite in a contribution
https://qooxdoo-contrib.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/qooxdoo-contrib/trunk/qooxdoo-contrib/VirtualData/trunk/source/class/virtualdata/model/SimpleTreeDataModel.js
However, I think eventually this should be part of the framework itself, since it is unclear when the new virtual widgets will be ready.
A separate bug will be created for qx.ui.table.Table.
No longer relevant, will be solved by the new virtual table widget when it finally arrives...
